amendment.description: To provide funding for home energy assistance needs under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.

action.text: Amendment SA 1595 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1595 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 336.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1595 made in Senate.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1595.

Amendment SA 1595 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11229-11231; text: CR S11230) To provide funding for home energy assistance needs under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1595 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 336.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1595 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1542.
